title: Manage Locomotive Fueling
description: A locomotive is running low on fuel. A yard dispatcher must schedule it for fueling.

tasks.description: Receive a remote telemetry alert that a locomotive's fuel level is below 25%.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent is notified of the low fuel status.

tasks.description: Find the locomotive's current location and its next scheduled assignment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sees the locomotive is in the main yard and is scheduled for an outbound train in 4 hours.

tasks.description: Create a work order for a hostler to move the locomotive to the fueling track.
tasks.expected_outcome: A work order is created for the internal move.

tasks.description: After fueling is complete, the locomotive is returned to the ready track for its next assignment.
tasks.expected_outcome: The fueling process is completed without delaying the outbound train.
